Name: The Five Cores Remastered
About the game: STORY After surviving a violent storm aboard your fishing boat, you regain consciousness on a deserted island. Your boat being totally destroyed, you must find a way to go back home. To do so, you will have to understand the mystery behind the five cores. FEATURES Node-based exploration or free-roaming 6 islands to explore Steam Achievements VR Support
